message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I see the value in the product, $18,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but $18,000 is the lowest I'm willing to go right now. I know this product will be very beneficial for you. Let me know if you're open to reconsidering.
